survey.story: Eating food is often a personal pleasure and social activity. Some people like all types of foods, and their interest in breakfast is similar to that of lunch or dinner. I want to share my story about how I view food and pay special attention to desserts. My daily meals are a unique blend of routine and spontaneity. I eat breakfast, lunch, or dinner each day a._(At Certain Times,  Within An Hour, During Each Part of the Day, When I Think of It) unless I’m eating _ b. ____________ (Out With a Friend, Out with Family, At Group Event, Traveling for Business, Traveling for Pleasure.)  I  skip meals about c.__% of the time during any given week and eat alone d. % of the time. My biggest meal of the day is a versatile affair, which I call ___ e. (Dinner, Supper, Feast, Nosh-Up). It can be a simple, comforting dish or a grand feast with multiple courses that I rank from most to least favorite as __f.__ (Appetizer, Soup, Salad, Side Dish, Dessert, Main Dish) Now, I’ll focus on the sweetness of dessert. Some people suggest that you eat a meal to get to dessert. In my view, dessert foods include _g.__( Candy, Fruit, Cheese, Baked Goods, Pudding, Pie, Ice Cream, Nuts), and consider my top three favorites as ___h.__________ and eat each one ___j._(Whenever Possible!, After a Meal, Before a Meal, As a Meal,  As a Snack) and enjoy it most often __k.___. (With Family, With Friends, Alone, In the Car, Whenever Possible!) They’re my favorites because of  ___m.____ (Childhood Memory, Specific Flavor, Familiar Taste, Estimated Calories, Certain Texture, Smell, Eating Convenience, Relative Cost, Appearance)
